creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: a ghost figure shown from the chest up bites its lower lip; the figure's features all sag and its eyes are on the verge of rolling up into its head; the figure is black and white with the exception of some pink in the whites of the eyes; the figure's right wrist bends downward and its hand has long, white nails; the mount is entirely text (Japanese) in primarily black ink with several red character inserted throughout
markings: Red, circular seal LRC: {Tessai}; Square, red stamp under signature on the back of mount at PR upper corner
signed: Signed in black ink on the back of mount at PR upper corner
title: Ghost
